content: grapes of wrap - cotton scarf - asymmetrical wrap scarf colorway be still my tart this pattern only requires one skein of yarn bee sugarwheel cotton yarn = 335 yds i used a 5mm hook you can use whatever yarn & hook you prefer but the more yarn the better so the scarf will wrap well note if possible weigh your skein before start so you can gauge when you ve reached your halfway point of yarn usage this pattern grows from 2 stitches up to the mid-point then decreases to a final stitch at completion the final piece should be a long triangle pattern notes use a stitch marker to indicate the increase/decrease row so you only increase/decrease on one side you will be increasing/decreasing by one stitch every other row
